EmailTemplate.description: Email sent to member when the reach certification stage of their application.
EmailTemplate.name: Certification Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Certification Confirmation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear [Name] [Surname]
Certification confirmation
We are pleased to confirm that [Membership Number] [Site], [Postcode] has now been certified from [date] to [date].
Your Certificate will be sent to you via email by the Membership Services Team in a moment.
In the meantime, if you have any questions please feel free to contact our membership services team on 01403 800141 or help@rspcaassured.org.uk
Yours sincerely
Membership services RSPCA Assured
